town_halls.title: ERA Town Hall Meeting
town_halls.summary:
*Meeting with Enabling The Future*

# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** November 27, 2024 | **Duration:** 119 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Work with John Schull to create comprehensive map of Panama Canal region including Darien Forest, Panama Canal watershed, and Atrato River watershed](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=6808.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting Purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [New members introduced: John Magugu (Kenya), Robert Patterson (Mexico), Mark Hobner (New York)](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=360.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Panama Canal Watershed Restoration project gaining momentum with new partnerships and government support](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=1500.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Global Earth Repair Conference & Festival planned for May 2025 in Washington state, aiming to bring together experts on greening the planet to cool the climate](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5271.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### New Member Introductions

- [John Magugu: Working on restoration along Lake Victoria basin in Kenya, focusing on biodiversity credits and river restoration](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=1506.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Robert Patterson: Based in Guadalajara, Mexico, developing innovative horticulture solutions with sub-irrigated planters for urban/small-scale food production](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=1596.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Mark Hobner: Based in Long Island, NY, working on behavior change programs for municipalities and nonprofits, particularly focused on food waste reduction and composting](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=1400.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Panama Canal Watershed Restoration Project Update

- [New partnerships forming: Potential MOU with CATHALAC (Water Center for the Humid Tropics of Latin America and the Caribbean) Developing relationships with indigenous groups (Guna Yala and Embera) Letter of support received from Panamanian Minister of Environment](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4037.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Potential MOU with CATHALAC (Water Center for the Humid Tropics of Latin America and the Caribbean)](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4342.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Developing relationships with indigenous groups (Guna Yala and Embera)](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4167.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Letter of support received from Panamanian Minister of Environment](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4500.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Expanding project scope: Considering broader ecosystem including Darien Forest and Atrato River watershed Addressing migration issues related to environmental stresses in the region](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4429.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Considering broader ecosystem including Darien Forest and Atrato River watershed](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=6819.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Addressing migration issues related to environmental stresses in the region](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=6927.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Next steps: Meeting with Vice Minister of Environment on Monday Developing MOUs to define relationships between core group, ERA, and partners](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4492.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Meeting with Vice Minister of Environment on Monday](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4492.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Developing MOUs to define relationships between core group, ERA, and partners](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=4507.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Global Earth Repair Conference & Festival 2025

- [Scheduled for May 2025 in Washington state](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5388.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Aims to bring together experts on greening the planet to cool the climate](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5363.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Currently have 41 presenters confirmed, aiming for 120-150 total](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5696.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Hybrid format: 1500 in-person attendees + robust online platform](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5762.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Seeking more connections to Global South participants](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5762.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Will include workshops, plenaries, music, and festival elements](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5854.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [Eduardo Marino to work with John Schull on creating a comprehensive map of the Panama project region](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=6819.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Michael Velarsky to continue organizing Global Earth Repair Conference, seeking ERA member participation](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5804.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ERA to consider participation/presence at Forest Stewardship Council general assembly in Panama (October 2024)](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5092.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Follow up on potential synergies between various projects (e.g. Brian von Herzen's Climate Foundation work, Indy's India eco-restoration tour)](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=5946.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Explore new organizational structures (e.g. commons incorporation) for ERA initiatives](https://fathom.video/share/3WBhiRd81u9JhC2fGH7EC6A4Qhr7vKdz?tab=summary&timestamp=6717.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
